alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 11:49AM PST until December 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches above 6000 feet...and over a foot above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. This includes Whitney Portal and Aspendell. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to slippery or snow packed roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall combined with gusty winds may reduce visibility, creating difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
